name: Purgatory Hospital
description:
This game made for Ludumdare 47 gamejam
Can you break the loop?
Escape from coma in the purgatory...
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/purgatory-hospital

CONTROLS

  • W,A,S,D Character Movement
  • Left Shift Run
  • Space Jump
  • Left Mouse Button Interact and Hold
  • Right Mouse Button Throw
